title: Very active Plat3 supp lf active 5s team(dynamic)
body:
Sorry for the post in english..i live in germany for a short period and didnt quite learned the laguage yet xd

Plat 3 last season/ plat 5 atm climbing lf very active team for long term to improve/create synergy / participate in tournaments atound plat elo!

I can play pretty much every supp apart of annie and i can adapt to team comps/ new meta . Very active player (pretty much everyday after 18 30 CET) ,friendly also able to take critisize. I can speak english fluently and spanish. Been already in a couple of tournaments and id like to participate again and im able to skype/curse/ts.
Prefer teams that already are playing for a while together and have some synergy going.

Add me ingame for more details :)
